description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Test your knowledge of the Bible with hundreds of trivia questions from the Old Testament and the New Testament.  Easy and hard levels to choose from.  Bonus mini-games are awarded after every round of 25 questions.  Great for Bible study or family entertainment.
